page.t: Activate and target a collectable asteroid
Introducing the Mineral Finder is an intuitive software tool that helps space miners easily locate nearby mineable asteroids.
The Collectible Locator is a user-friendly software tool designed to help space explorers easily find nearby loot and collectibles.
Manually targeting loot will create a mission that targets the same loot.
Previously dropped inventory loot are dropped from asteroids that don't or are doubled from asteroids that do.
Multiplier for inventory loot from asteroids that drop them. More efficient inventory loot mining is required.
Multiplier for inventory loot from asteroids that don't drop them. More efficient inventory loot mining is required.
The maximum number of targets for the Loot targeting AI.
The Mineral Finder and Collectible Locator are required for the ship to auto-target mineable asteroids and collectible loot.
